name: You're the little brother
description:
In this game you'll play a platform game. In the game, you must race through the map and save the princess . you can jump, run, and walk across each level. The worlds are full of enemies and platforms, and open holes. If you touches an enemy, you die. If you falls down a hole or misses a jump, you will also lose a life... Or at least that what my older brother said.

If you had an older brother/sister or you were the oldest, and you wanted to play together, you will probably have deja vu with this game.
